body:
The Deck Strength (AI vs AI option) on the duel screen only has a visible indicator for the total number of games played.

It would be handy to have something to show that an individual game is being played, as the games tend to take a long time (for me anyway) to complete. I can imagine some users thinking that nothing's happening at all.
author: [ShawnieBoyUK](https://code.google.com/u/ShawnieBoyUK/)
title: Deck Strength in progress indicator

comments.body:
I guess the indicator is if the button has a red cross instead of the green "play" icon. Still, it would be simple to enough to add the animated busy icon (similar to when the AI is thinking during a duel) if that would be clearer.
